addLiquidity(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Adds liquidity to a liquidity pool.

params.amountA: The quantity of the first token.
params.amountB: The quantity of the second token.
params.tokenA: The first token in the pool.
params.tokenB: The second token in the pool.

params.desiredAmountOut: Desired amount of the final token.
params.maxPrice: Maximum acceptable price across the token pairs in the path.
params.path: Sequence of tokens to be swapped.
params.recipient: Address to receive the final tokens.
params.routingAgent: Agent responsible for routing the swap.

calculateSwapAmounts(address[]).details: Computes input and output quantities for a token swap.

params.path: Sequence of tokens to be swapped.

returns.amountOutMax: Maximum amount of final tokens to be received.

getDepth(address,address).details: Calculates the trading depth available for a token pair.

returns.depth: Available trading depth for the base token.

getPrice(address,address).details: Queries the current price for a token pair.

redeemLiquidity(address,address,uint256,.details: Redeems liquidity tokens for underlying assets.

params.desiredAmountTokenA: Desired amount of the first token.
params.desiredAmountTokenB: Desired amount of the second token.
params.tokenA: The first token in the pool.
params.tokenB: The second token in the pool.

documentation.text:
@title IDEX
 @dev Interface for a decentralized exchange (DEX) for functions like trading, liquidity provision, and liquidity redemption.
